title: N300 Mayo's Cut Plug Duffy SGC
author: ccre

posts.post_title: N300 Mayo's Cut Plug Duffy SGC
posts.post_content: For sale. Hugh Duffy HOF SGC A. Someone has colored in the upper left corner and possibly lower left side hence the authentic grade.  Look great otherwise.  $620 shipped. Paypal f/f or checks accepted. Thanks for looking. Dave
Awesome copy of one of the greatest cards of all time, if I do say so myself. Best of luck with your sale!

Thank you NJ!  Bump it up.

[quote name="njdunkin1" post=1632176]Awesome copy of one of the greatest cards of all time, if I do say so myself. Best of luck with your sale![/QUOTE]
Just reduced to $620 shipped.  Thanks for looking.
